Especially in his 40 years in politics. 13 provincial political career. Lin Zexu to the Qing Dynasty. diligent as the official. the benefit of the Quartet. leaving the Forest Blue sky reputation. The Sea is hundred rivers. have capacity is big. adamant. no desire . - Approaching Lin Zexu(Chinese Edition)
